alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 2:39AM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Guadalupe County, Quay County, Eastern San Miguel County, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County
